alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 5:02PM EDT until July 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... Southern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 502 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles south of Monticello to 9 miles southeast of St. Marks, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perry, Madison, Greenville, Lee, Pinland, Hells Half Acre, Ebb, Lamont, Buckville, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Scanlon, Foley, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Sirmans and Shady Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
